name: LINE Design System - Messenger (Unofficial)
description:
这是一个非官方发布的设计文件。


文件中的设计风格和样式参考了 LDSM 。 (因为 LINE 官方并未公开他们的 UI 组件，所以文件中的组件的样式参数可能会有偏差。)


这只是一个兴趣爱好者的个人作品，并没有获得 LINE 的授权，版权属于 ©LINE Corporation。


文件中使用到的 icon 来自 REMIX ICON，感谢 🙏 。



— Translated by DeepL —————————

This is an unofficially released design file.


The design style and style in the file is based on LDSM. (Since LINE does not officially disclose their UI Kit, the style parameters of the components in the file may deviate.)


This is a personal work of a hobbyist, not licensed by LINE, and is copyright ©LINE Corporation.


The icons used in the file are from REMIX ICON, thanks to 🙏 .
